name: Socrative Midnight
description:
This is a style that darkens the webpage on socrative.org when taking a test. Normally, it is a bright white that can get annoying. This style fixes the white and replaces it with dark colors that are easier on the eyes.
Don't change the colors if you just want the Midnight scheme.

user.name: billnyethestyleguy
user.about: I'm just interested in computers and coding. I code sometimes in my free time.

additional_info:
v1.1: added customization 3/13/17
v1.0: released 3/12/17
Credit to https://userstyles.org/styles/134344/socrative-dark for the initial inspiration.

If you have any suggestions or problems, please comment below! I would love to hear your feedback!
